name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Stack Exchange Editor Keyboard Shortcuts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the JavaScript keyboard shortcuts on the answer box on Stack Overflow and all the Stack Exchange network websites so youâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the JavaScript keyboard shortcuts on the answer box on Stack Overflow and all the Stack Exchange network websites so you can use readline/emacs style movement keys like ctrl-b.
